summary: Hektar REIT proposes a private placement of up to 141,857,337 new units, representing up to 20% of the total issued units. The funds will be used for future investments, asset enhancement, and working capital.

utilisation_of_proceeds.details: Potential acquisition of yield-accretive assets to expand and enhance its portfolio.
Refurbishment and enhancement of facilities and conditions of Hektar REIT's properties and investment in systems to enhance energy management and consumption efficiency.
Property operating expenses such as property maintenance, marketing and promotions.
Professional fees, placement fees, regulatory fees and other incidental expenses.
